title: UP BJP condemns Bihar Congress for video targeting PM, his mother
description: The video, reportedly created using artificial intelligence (AI), has drawn sharp criticism from the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP), with senior leaders calling it disrespectful and offensive.
content:
A fresh political controversy has erupted after the Bihar Congress uploaded a video on social media allegedly targeting Prime Minister Narendra Modi and his late mother.
The video, reportedly created using artificial intelligence (AI), has drawn shar... [1459 chars]

title: Microsoft Plans Big AI Chip Investment, To Look Beyond OpenAI
description: Microsoft is preparing to pour significant resources into building its own set of artificial intelligence chips as the company looks to become self-sufficient and not become too reliant on OpenAI, the company's AI Chief Executive Officer, Mustafa Suleyman, told employees in a recent employee-only meeting.

title: Albania's Prime Minister Appoints an AI-Generated 'Minister' to Tackle Corruption
description: TIRANA, Albania (AP) — Albania’s prime minister on Friday tapped an Artificial Intelligence-generated ‘minister’ to tackle corruption in his new Cabinet, a project launched with the help of Microsoft.

title: Public service job cuts expected, official says

title: N.L.'s 10-year education action plan cites sources that don't exist
description: A major report on modernizing the education system in Newfoundland and Labrador is peppered with fake sources some educators say were likely fabricated by generative artificial intelligence.

title: Want to Shave 10 Hours Off Your Workweek? How AI Can Help
description: Artificial intelligence is overhauling how companies operate, freeing up entrepreneurs and their workers to skip the menial stuff and get down to business.
